body.p: I herewith forward you my bond executed as directed, the bond is amply good. I wish the comission to cover at least such of the 21st Ky vols as may warnt to send every by me, way of the 9th Ky reside in ^this^ county and adjoining ours. I would accept for them, but if it suit the Gov. as well, let the Commission be alone for the 21st there are dangerous times to cary way, no news here, I do not think the guerillas will pester this place, as it is now garisoned.
